content.webTitle: Klinsmann is right man for the future, says Ballack

fields.headline: Klinsmann is right man for the future, says Ballack
fields.bodyText: Michael Ballack wants Jürgen Klinsmann to stay on as German national coach after the World Cup. The pair reportedly clashed over the midfielder's fitness last week, but Ballack said yesterday: "We have a team which can develop and has been forecast a bright future," he said. "I would be pleased if he continued because it would be great for German football."
